string.text:
OTs-02 "Kiparis" (Cypress) is a sub-machine gun, developed in 1972 by order of the Ministry of Defence of the USSR by weapon designers from TsKIB COO of Tula. The layout is based on the Czechoslovak sub-machine gun Scorpion Vz.61 (1961 variant). The OTs-02 "Kiparis" automatic mechanism is powered by a free bolt recoil. Shots are fired from closed bolt, which increases the accuracy of fire. To increase stability of the weapon, a folding stock is used, which in the compact position is folded on top of the receiver. In the Zone, this weapon is not uncommon and usually used by bandits and loners who can't afford a better weapon.
 Mechanic Polimer, as it turned out, considers himself a true fan of the old, but very affordable cartridge 9x18 in the southern regions of the Zone. The line of inexpensive sub-machine guns he developed is very popular among stalkers in all factions in Zone.
 This model differs from the standard mainly in some simple attachments and slightly increased rate of fire.
 %c[ui_gray_2]ATTACHMENTS: 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] The weapons are equipped with: the cheapest of all possible laser sight and a picatinny rail for attaching some small sights.(Also, as a bonus, Polymer gives you a set of 40 round mags when you buying it).
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Scopes: All Red Dot Sights for picatinny/weaver except of scopes with long mount such as: Eotech 553/XPS, C-More, OKP-7, Meprolight M21, EKP-8-18 and Kemper.
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Suppressor: 0217 Sound Suppressor.
 %c[ui_gray_2]COMPATIBLE MOD KITS: Custom weapon mod kit

OTs-02 "Kiparis" (Cypress) is a sub-machine gun, developed in 1972 by order of the Ministry of Defence of the USSR by weapon designers from TsKIB COO of Tula. The layout is based on the Czechoslovak sub-machine gun Scorpion Vz.61 (1961 variant). The OTs-02 "Kiparis" automatic mechanism is powered by a free bolt recoil. Shots are fired from closed bolt, which increases the accuracy of fire. To increase stability of the weapon, a folding stock is used, which in the compact position is folded on top of the receiver. In the Zone, this weapon is not uncommon and usually used by bandits and loners who can't afford a better weapon.
 Mechanic Polimer, as it turned out, considers himself a true fan of the old, but very affordable cartridge 9x18 in the southern regions of the Zone. The line of inexpensive sub-machine guns he developed is very popular among stalkers in all factions in Zone. This model was made by Polymer for Duty faction.
 This model differs from the standard mainly in some simple attachments and slightly increased rate of fire. Also this model comes with handcrafted Bakelite foregrip which increases the recoil control. The Bakelite grip is attached to steel brace connected to the buttom of the Kiparis's fore-end and reinforced with three titanium screws.
 %c[ui_gray_2]ATTACHMENTS: 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] The weapons are equipped with: laser sight and, picatinny rail for attaching some small sights and handcrafted Bakelite foregrip. (Also, as a bonus, Polymer gives you a set of 40 round mags when you buying it).
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Scopes: Trijicon Acog and Red Dot Sights for picatinny/weaver except of scopes with long mount such as: Eotech 553, C-More, Meprolight M21, EKP-8-18.
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Suppressor: 0217 Sound Suppressor.
 %c[ui_gray_2]COMPATIBLE MOD KITS: Clear Sky modification kit

OTs-02 "Kiparis" (Cypress) is a sub-machine gun, developed in 1972 by order of the Ministry of Defence of the USSR by weapon designers from TsKIB COO of Tula. The layout is based on the Czechoslovak sub-machine gun Scorpion Vz.61 (1961 variant). The OTs-02 "Kiparis" automatic mechanism is powered by a free bolt recoil. Shots are fired from closed bolt, which increases the accuracy of fire. To increase stability of the weapon, a folding stock is used, which in the compact position is folded on top of the receiver. In the Zone, this weapon is not uncommon and usually used by bandits and loners who can't afford a better weapon.
 Mechanic Polimer, as it turned out, considers himself a true fan of the old, but very affordable cartridge 9x18 in the southern regions of the Zone. The line of inexpensive sub-machine guns he developed is very popular among stalkers in all factions in Zone. This model was made by Polymer for Clear Sky faction.
 This model differs from the standard mainly in some simple attachments and slightly increased rate of fire. Also this model comes with handcrafted Bakelite foregrip which increases the recoil control. The Bakelite grip is attached to steel brace connected to the buttom of the Kiparis's fore-end and reinforced with three titanium screws.
 %c[ui_gray_2]ATTACHMENTS: 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] The weapons are equipped with: laser sight and, picatinny rail for attaching some small sights and handcrafted Bakelite foregrip. The kit includes a set of 81 round drum mags.
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Scopes: Trijicon Acog and Red Dot Sights for picatinny/weaver except of scopes with long mount such as: Eotech 553, C-More, Meprolight M21, EKP-8-18.
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Suppressor: 9mm supressor
